sn14.2:1.2: “Mendicants, diversity of elements gives rise to diversity of contacts.
sn14.2:1.3: And what is the diversity of elements?
sn14.2:1.4: The eye element, ear element, nose element, tongue element, body element, and mind element.
sn14.2:1.5: This is called the diversity of elements.
sn14.2:2.1: And how does diversity of elements give rise to diversity of contacts?
sn14.2:2.2: The eye element gives rise to eye contact.
sn14.2:2.7: The mind element gives rise to mind contact.
sn14.2:2.8: That’s how diversity of elements gives rise to diversity of contacts.”
